description: Connection to InfluxDB with metrics from signalk and telegraf required

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["navigation"] == "overground")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 1.943844 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: -3h, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "wind")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "true")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 1.94384}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> yield(name: "windspeed")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "wind")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "angle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "apparent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r._value*180.0/3.1415) }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "course")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["navigation"] == "overground")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: ((r._value*180.0/3.1415)+360.0)%360.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "signalk_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "position")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lat" or r["_field"] == "lon")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
	|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
	|> filter(fn: (r) => exists r["lat"] and exists r["lon"])

from(bucket:"${signalk}")
  |> range(start:  -6h, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pressure")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "outside")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 100.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 20s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> yield(name: "pressure")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "depth")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "keel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "outside")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> yield(name: "outside")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "inside")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> yield(name: "inside")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "fridge")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> yield(name: "fridge")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "freezer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> yield(name: "freezer")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "water")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "water")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["navigation"] == "throughwater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] != "trip")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1852.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${telegraf}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${skhost}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${telegraf}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${fhost}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "description")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "signalk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["label"] == "bucket")
  |> last()
list.name: signalk

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "description")
  |> keep(columns: ["id"])
  |> distinct(column: "id")
list.label: MMSI
list.name: mmsi

list.definition:
import "date"
import "strings"

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sunrise")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with sunrise: string(v: date.add(d: ${timezone}, to: time(v: uint(v: r._value)))) }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: strings.substring(start: 11, end: strings.strlen(v: r.sunrise)-11, v: r.sunrise) }))
list.label: Sunrise
list.name: sunrise

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement != "description")
  |> keep(columns: ["source"])
  |> distinct(column: "source")
list.label: Sources
list.name: sources

  |> distinct(column: "source")

title: SignalK Board [sailing]
